ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Bypass_User_Validations__c = False, RecordType.Name <> "Private Equity - TMT", TEXT( Status__c ) <> 'Portfolio' , TEXT(CS__c) = 'Include' , ISBLANK(DC__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Deal Team Contact to be shown for JYB/SCN Reporting.
